Course Full Description and Welcome Letter:


Hello!

Welcome to the online leadership course. This course is intended and will be useful for those who want to develop leadership skills, work with groups of people, and develop flexible skills like planning and decision-making.


This course can be the beginning of your new life, in which you will use flexible skills and leadership qualities that, as a result, will help you work effectively with people, manage your life and build communication.


In modern competitive times, leadership is the most important quality and skill that contributes to personal development and career growth. A leader can easily find a language with any group of people, make both individual and group decisions, manage changes, guide and inspire people, become better himself and help others in this.


And this course is a great opportunity to learn it at your own pace. The main recommendation for completing the course is to practice the theories and knowledge that are given here, because knowledge becomes useful and effective when you transition into a skill.


I have been teaching leadership for more than 10 years, judging by my changes and the changes of my students, I can say with confidence that this is one of the key success factors both in my personal life and at work.


A little about me

My name is Zhansaya, but for you I'm just Saya


For the last 10 years, I have been teaching adults and children leadership, communication, conflict management, decision-making, planning - all the flexible skills necessary for life and work.


In addition, I teach trainers and teachers who further transfer this knowledge and skills. Higher economic education in the field of management and marketing helps me to lead leadership not only as a life skill, but also as a professional for becoming top managers and managers.


I wish you new knowledge and hope that the course will be useful and effective for you!

Let's get started!

Dr. Alex Amoroso is a seasoned professional with a rich background in academia and industry, specializing in research methodologies, strategy formulation, and product development. courseDetails.title: دورة التدريب على الاستقبال الفندقي: ماجستير الضيافة
courseDetails.shortDescription: تعلم من مدير قسم الاستقبال في فندق فاخر بخمس نجوم
courseDetails.longDescription:
أنا أنطونيو كانافو، مدير قسم الاستقبال في فيلا سانت أندريا، وهو فندق من فنادق بيلموند، الذي يتمتع بسمعة فريدة وتاريخ عريق في مجال الفندقة الفاخرة.

في هذه الدورة الرائدة، سأقدم لك وجهة نظري الشخصية وخبرتي الواسعة كمدير لفندق فاخر بخمس نجوم. سأشارك معك النصائح والتقنيات التي ساعدتني في الوصول إلى النجاح في عالم الضيافة وقسم الاستقبال.

سنستكشف سويًا أساسيات الضيافة وأهمية قسم الاستقبال في تقديم تجربة استثنائية للضيوف. سأقدم لك رؤية واضحة حول كيفية تطوير مهاراتك ومسارك المهني في هذا المجال المثير.

سنتناول أيضًا كيف يمكن للتقنيات والمهارات الحديثة أن تساعد في تحويل التحديات إلى فرص ناجحة، وننظر معًا إلى أفضل الممارسات في تقديم تجربة فريدة وراقية للضيوف.

باعتبارك محترفًا في مجال الضيافة، يجب أن تكون قادرًا على التواصل بفعالية مع الضيوف من جميع أنحاء العالم، وفهم احتياجاتهم بدقة. سأشارك معك كيفية تطوير مهارات التواصل والتفاعل الاجتماعي لتقديم خدمة استثنائية.

إذا كنت ترغب في النجاح في صناعة الضيافة الفاخرة، فهذه الدورة مصممة خصيصًا لك. ستكون مفيدة للمحترفين الشباب الذين يسعون إلى الارتقاء بمهنتهم، ولكنها أيضًا مفيدة للمديرين الكبار الذين يرغبون في تحسين قدراتهم القيادية والتفكير الاستراتيجي.

في نهاية الدورة، أتمنى أن تكون قد استفدت وتطورت كقائد أفضل وشخص أفضل، وأن تكون قادرًا على تحقيق النجاح في مسارك المهني وإبهار العالم بمهاراتك وخبراتك الفريدة في مجال الضيافة.
targetAudiences: فريق الاستقبال في الفندق
طلاب الضيافة

courseDetails.title: Business Process Simplification & Workflow Optimization
courseDetails.shortDescription: Process Mapping | Workflow Optimization | Lean Tools | Business Process Simplification | Continuous Improvement
courseDetails.longDescription:
In a world where speed, agility, and efficiency determine success, businesses cannot afford to run on outdated, inefficient processes. Whether you’re a growing company or a large organization, the ability to simplify, streamline, and optimize business processes has become a key differentiator.


This course is your step-by-step guide to mastering business process simplification and workflow optimization. You will learn how to map processes, identify inefficiencies, eliminate waste, automate repetitive tasks, and create standardized systems that drive real, measurable results.


Designed for professionals responsible for business operations, HR, strategy, or performance improvement, this course gives you a complete toolkit to transform the way your organization works—backed by practical assignments and personal feedback from Mike Pritula, a top HR leader and process expert.


What you’ll achieve by the end of the course:

• A strong understanding of how to simplify and improve business processes

• Ability to identify bottlenecks, redundancies, and hidden inefficiencies

• Skills to map workflows using tools like stakeholder maps, flowcharts, and value stream mapping

• Proficiency in applying process improvement tools: 5S, 5 Whys, 8D, SIPOC, SWOT, ICOR, DRIVE

• Confidence in managing process changes and aligning them with strategic goals

• A practical roadmap for building a culture of continuous improvement


Course Structure


Section 1: Introduction to Business Process Simplification

• What is a process and why optimization matters

• Benefits of process improvement

• Principles of simplification and process maturity models


Section 2: Mapping and Visualizing Workflows

• Process mapping methods: flow, cross-functional, stakeholder, value stream

• Process documentation and structure


Section 3: Managing and Implementing Change

• Process improvement frameworks

• Aligning improvement with company strategy

• Modeling and managing process architecture


Section 4: Tools for Simplification and Optimization

• Essential tools: 5S, 5 Whys, 8D, checklists, flow diagrams

• Advanced frameworks: SIPOC, SWOT, prioritization matrix, ICOR, DRIVE

• Analytical tools including linear regression and the nominal group technique


Section 5: Building a Culture of Continuous Improvement

• Shaping behavior and mindset for lasting change

• The role of leadership and HR in process transformation


This course is not just about theory—it’s about results. You will walk away with a set of ready-to-use tools, frameworks, and templates that you can immediately apply in your work. Whether you’re an HR leader, operations manager, consultant, or entrepreneur, mastering business process simplification can elevate your impact and value.


Join now and start transforming your business—one process at a time.
targetAudiences: HR professionals, COOs, and department heads looking to improve internal processes and efficiency
Business owners and entrepreneurs who want to scale operations without increasing waste
Project managers and team leads seeking practical tools for process analysis and improvement
Beginners interested in learning the fundamentals of business process optimization

ستتعلم كيفية استخدام الإكسل في سياقات مختلفة وعلى نطاق واسع، من تنظيم البيانات وإنشاء جداول حسابات إلى إنشاء رسوم بيانية ديناميكية وتحليل البيانات بشكل فعال. سنركز على تطبيقات عملية وأمثلة واقعية لاستخدام الإكسل في مجالات مثل الأعمال والمالية وإدارة المشاريع.


ستتلقى توجيهًا خطوة بخطوة لتطوير مهاراتك، بدءًا من الأساسيات وصولاً إلى الوظائف والتقنيات المتقدمة. سنعمل على تحسين قدراتك في استخدام الصيغ والدوال المدمجة وإجراء التحليلات الإحصائية وإنشاء تقارير متقدمة باستخدام الإكسل.


هذه الدورة في الإكسل مناسبة لطلاب الجامعات والمعاهد الذين يسعون لتعلم مهارات إدارة البيانات والتحليل، وكذلك للمحترفين في مجالات الأعمال والمالية الذين يحتاجون إلى استخدام الإكسل في إعداد التقارير واتخاذ القرارات الاستراتيجية. بالإضافة إلى ذلك، فإن المحللين والموظفين الإداريين سيستفيدون أيضًا من هذه الدورة لتعزيز مهاراتهم في تنظيم البيانات وتقديم التقارير بشكل مؤثر. وأخيرًا، فإن رواد الأعمال سيجدون في هذه الدورة أدوات قوية لإدارة البيانات وتحليل أداء الأعمال لدعم نمو مشاريعهم واتخاذ القرارات الاستراتيجية بنجاح.


استعد لتحقيق تقدم واضح في مهارات الإكسل واكتساب الثقة في استخدام هذه الأداة الرائعة للعمل والدراسة. احجز مقعدك الآن وابدأ رحلتك نحو التفوق في استخدام الإكسل بثقة وكفاءة.

What is Office Administration Management?

Office Administration Management focuses on ensuring the smooth, efficient, and organized operation of an office environment. This includes tasks vital to the success of any company, whether small or large. Key areas include:

  • Resource Management: Overseeing office supplies, equipment, facilities, and budgets.

  • Information Management: Handling records, data organization, mail handling, and creating effective filing systems.

  • Communication: Managing phone calls, emails, internal memos, and external communications, ensuring clear information flow.

  • Staff Support: Supporting employees by coordinating schedules, managing payroll, and assisting with HR functions.

  • Project & Event Coordination: Planning meetings, conferences, travel arrangements, and other business events.


Main Functionality of an Office Administration Manager

The Office Administration Manager is the backbone of a well-run office. Their primary responsibilities include:

  • Overseeing Daily Operations: Ensuring all the gears of the office are turning smoothly, from supply orders to communication channels.

  • Problem Solving: Anticipating issues, troubleshooting problems, and implementing solutions as challenges arise.

  • Process Improvement: Identifying areas where efficiency can be optimized and streamlining existing administrative systems.

  • Supervision & Leadership: Guiding and supporting other administrative staff, providing training, and fostering a positive work environment.

  • Budgeting & Financial Oversight: Tracking expenses, preparing reports, and maintaining financial records.


How Office Administration Management Skills Build Your Career

Investing in developing your Office Administration Management skills offers numerous career advantages:

  • Increased Value: The ability to manage administrative operations effectively makes you indispensable in any business setting.

  • Transferable Skills: Skills honed in office administration, like communication, organization, and problem-solving, are in demand in virtually every industry.

  • Leadership Potential: Strong office management experience prepares you for supervisory roles and more advanced positions in management.

  • Varied Career Paths: Office administration offers room for growth into specialized fields such as human resources, project management, or executive assisting.

  • Entrepreneurial Opportunities: A solid administrative foundation is invaluable if you aim to one day launch your own business.

Mastering Competency-Based Behavioral Interviews


Course Description:


Hiring the right talent is one of the most critical aspects of building a high-performing organization. Competency-based behavioral interviews help hiring managers, recruiters, and HR professionals assess candidates effectively by focusing on past experiences and demonstrated skills. This course is designed to equip you with the knowledge, techniques, and tools needed to conduct structured, competency-based interviews that lead to better hiring decisions.


Through practical case studies, real-world examples, and interview simulations, you’ll learn how to identify key competencies, structure behavioral interview questions, and evaluate candidate responses using a scoring system. Whether you are an HR professional, hiring manager, or recruiter, this course will enhance your interviewing skills and ensure you select the best-fit candidates for your organization.

What You’ll Learn:


The Fundamentals of Competency-Based Interviews – Understand the principles behind behavioral interviewing and how it improves hiring accuracy.


Developing a Competency Model – Learn how to define core competencies for different job roles and integrate them into the hiring process.


Crafting Effective Behavioral Interview Questions – Master the STAR (Situation, Task, Action, Result) method and other structured interview techniques.


Evaluating Candidates Objectively – Implement competency-based scoring rubrics and minimize bias in the selection process.


Avoiding Common Interviewing Mistakes – Identify biases, pitfalls, and ineffective questioning methods that can lead to poor hiring decisions.


Improving Hiring Decisions with Data – Leverage competency frameworks, assessment grids, and interview scorecards for better decision-making.

Course Program:

6. Improving Hiring Success with Competency-Based Interviewing


• Case studies of companies using competency-based selection

Who Should Take This Course?


HR professionals & recruiters looking to refine their interview process and hire high-quality candidates.

What is Project Management?

Project management is the organized application of knowledge, processes, skills, and tools to guide a project from its beginning to its successful completion. It involves:

  • Defining goals: Deciding what the project should achieve.

  • Planning: Mapping out the steps and resources needed.

  • Executing: Putting the plan into action, directing the team, and managing resources.

  • Monitoring and controlling: Tracking progress, managing changes, and addressing issues.

  • Closing: Reviewing the project, documenting results, and learning from the experience.


What is Business Project Management?

Business project management refers to applying project management principles within a business setting. These projects focus on achieving business objectives such as:

  • Launching new products or services

  • Improving or automating business processes

  • Restructuring departments

  • Implementing new software systems


The Role of Project Management

Project management plays a critical role in businesses because it:

  • Increases Efficiency: A well-defined project plan helps streamline work and avoid wasted effort.

  • Ensures Results: Project management keeps the focus on meeting defined goals within time and budget restrictions.

  • Manages Risk: Potential problems are anticipated and mitigated through careful planning and monitoring.

  • Improves Communication: Clear communication channels among team members, stakeholders, and clients help avoid misunderstandings.

  • Improves Client Satisfaction: Successful project completion within agreed-upon parameters builds trust with clients.


Why is Learning Project Management Important for Companies?

Companies invest in their employees' project management training because:

Competitive Advantage: Companies with strong project management capabilities deliver projects more successfully, gain a reputation for reliability, and outperform competitors.

Reduces Costs: Inefficient projects cost more due to delays and wasted resources. Project management helps optimize resources.

Enhances Employee Morale: Well-run projects minimize stress, improve team collaboration, and create a sense of accomplishment.

Improves Innovation: Structured project management allows for managing innovation projects, leading to a culture of innovation within the company.


How Project Management Skills Boost Your Career

Developing your project management skills can significantly enhance your career prospects:

High Demand: Project managers are in demand across industries like IT, construction, healthcare, etc.

Better Salary: Skilled project managers often earn higher salaries due to their expertise.

Leadership Potential: Project management provides a solid foundation for taking on leadership roles within organizations.

Versatility: Project management skills apply to a wide range of jobs and roles, not just project management positions.

Personal Growth: You'll build organizational, problem-solving, and communication skills, making you an asset to any team


Linked topics:

  • Project Management

  • Basic office skills

  • Basic Business skills

  • Communication skills

  • Organizational skills

courseDetails.shortDescription: Organizational Design | Company Structure | Star Model | Matrix Structure | Leadership Layers | Business Agility
courseDetails.longDescription:
Your company structure is either driving growth—or holding it back.

This course shows you how to fix that.

Welcome to Organizational Design & Company Structure Mastery — a complete, practical guide to building high-performing structures that align with strategy, enhance agility, and boost accountability across your business.

Led by Mike Pritula, a global HR expert with 20+ years of experience and 150+ courses, this program breaks down complex organizational theory into step-by-step models, frameworks, and real-world case studies from companies like Wargaming, Vega, and ArcelorMittal.

Whether you’re designing a startup org chart or restructuring a multinational team, this course will equip you with everything you need to design, implement, and lead with clarity.

⸻

What You’ll Learn

• How to analyze business challenges and translate them into structural design

• When to use functional, divisional, matrix, or hybrid structures

• How to apply models like the Star Model and layers of leadership

• How to create accountability systems, clarify roles, and distribute decision-making

• How to build implementation plans, manage transitions, and roll out new workflows

• How to run organizational design projects and monitor impact

• Real insights from successful restructures in global companies

⸻

Course Program

Class 1: Organizational Design Essentials

– The 5-step design process, HR’s role, and leadership in structuring

Class 2: Business Analysis for Structure

– Strategic drivers, Star Model, and the six decision levers

Class 3: Choosing the Right Structure

– Functional, product, divisional, and matrix models with pros and cons

Class 4: Integration & Operational Design

– Layers of management, decision flows, and power distribution

Class 5: Leadership & Accountability

– Span of control, top-level clarity, and effective staffing models

Class 6: Managing the Transition

– Change planning, phased implementation, and change management

Class 7: Running Org Design Projects

– Project flow, facilitation, and adaptive structures

Class 8: Case Studies from Real Companies

– Wargaming, Vega, Parallel, Corum, ArcelorMittal—lessons from the field

⸻

Why This Course Is Different

• Step-by-step system from theory to execution

• Taught by a global HR leader with real-world transformation experience

• Templates and tools you can use immediately

• Case studies from real organizations — not just theory

• Certification included to showcase your expertise

⸻

Who Should Enroll

• HR professionals designing or changing org structures

• Consultants and OD specialists working on transformation projects

• CEOs, COOs, and business leaders building scalable operations

• L&D and People Ops managers supporting change initiatives

⸻

Don’t let outdated structure hold your business back.

Enroll now and learn how to build organizations that are lean, scalable, and built for success.

Your journey to becoming a strategic organizational design expert starts here.

courseDetails.longDescription:
Recruiter Mastery: The Ultimate Guide to Talent Acquisition and Recruitment


Master the Art of Recruiting, Sourcing, and Talent Acquisition


Recruitment is the backbone of every successful organization. A recruiter plays a critical role in finding, attracting, and hiring top talent, ensuring companies build high-performing teams. This comprehensive recruitment course is designed to provide you with the skills, tools, and strategies necessary to excel in modern recruiting and talent acquisition.


Led by HR and recruitment expert Mike Pritula, this course covers the entire recruitment lifecycle—from sourcing and selection to employer branding and recruitment automation. Whether you are an aspiring recruiter, an HR professional looking to enhance your recruitment skills, or a hiring manager, this course will equip you with the best industry practices and modern hiring techniques.

What You’ll Learn in This Recruitment Course


Fundamentals of Recruiting and Talent Acquisition

1. Introduction to Recruitment and the Role of a Recruiter

• Understanding the importance of recruitment in HR and business

• Key responsibilities and competencies of a recruiter

• The difference between recruitment, talent acquisition, and headhunting

• Planning a career as a recruiter

2. Recruitment Planning and Hiring Strategies

• Workforce planning and headcount forecasting

• Developing a recruitment strategy aligned with business goals

• Understanding the recruitment funnel and optimizing conversion rates

3. Sourcing and Candidate Search Techniques

• Boolean search, X-ray search, and advanced sourcing strategies

• Using LinkedIn, GitHub, Stack Overflow, and other talent platforms

• Creating candidate personas and target talent mapping

• Building talent pools and pipelines for future hiring needs

4. Recruitment Marketing and Employer Branding

• How to position your company as an employer of choice

• Crafting engaging job descriptions and job postings

• Using ChatGPT and AI for content automation in recruitment

• Leveraging social media for recruitment and talent attraction


Candidate Assessment and Selection Process

5. Interviewing and Candidate Evaluation

• Structuring and conducting competency-based interviews

• Behavioral interview techniques and STAR method

• Candidate screening, shortlisting, and evaluating soft/hard skills

• How to reduce hiring bias and ensure fair selection

6. Psychometric and Skills Testing in Recruitment

• Using online assessments and pre-employment testing tools

• Designing technical and role-specific tests

• Developing case studies, role-plays, and assessment centers

7. Recruitment Process Optimization and Metrics

• Understanding key recruitment metrics (time to hire, cost per hire, quality of hire)

• Using data and analytics to improve hiring efficiency

• Identifying and solving bottlenecks in the recruitment process


Advanced Recruitment Strategies and Hiring Techniques

8. Negotiation and Job Offer Management

• How to structure a compelling job offer package

• Counter-offers and negotiation strategies

• Best practices for closing candidates successfully

9. Onboarding and New Hire Integration

• Designing a structured onboarding program for new hires

• Preboarding, induction, and orientation best practices

• Ensuring a smooth transition from recruitment to retention

10. Executive Search and Headhunting Techniques


• Finding and attracting C-level executives and senior professionals

• How to engage passive candidates and hidden talent

• Building relationships with top-tier professionals


Technology, AI, and Automation in Recruitment

11. Recruitment Automation and ATS Systems


• Overview of Applicant Tracking Systems (ATS) and CRM tools

• Automating recruitment workflows for efficiency

• How AI and ChatGPT are transforming recruitment


12. Legal Compliance and Ethical Recruiting


• Understanding GDPR and EEOC guidelines in hiring

• Avoiding discrimination and ensuring ethical hiring practices

• Confidentiality and data security in recruitment

Who Should Take This Recruitment Course?

• Aspiring recruiters looking to start a career in talent acquisition

• HR professionals aiming to improve their recruitment and hiring skills

• Hiring managers who want to make better hiring decisions

• Experienced recruiters looking to upgrade their sourcing and selection techniques

Why Take This Recruiting Course?


Comprehensive Training – Covers all aspects of recruiting, talent acquisition, sourcing, and hiring

Hands-On Learning – Practical exercises, case studies, and real-world hiring scenarios

Led by Industry Expert – Learn from Mike Pritula, a top HR and recruitment professional

Latest Tools & AI Techniques – Master Boolean search, ATS systems, and recruitment automation

Recruitment Certification – Earn a certificate upon completion to boost your career

Enroll now and start mastering the art of recruiting and talent acquisition!

courseDetails.longDescription:
Welcome to course: Professional Diploma in Corporate Management by MTF Institute


Course provided by MTF Institute of Management, Technology and Finance

MTF is the global educational and research institute with HQ at Lisbon, Portugal, focused on business & professional hybrid (on-campus and online) education at areas: Business & Administration, Science & Technology, Banking & Finance.

MTF R&D center focused on research activities at areas: Artificial Intelligence, Machine Learning, Data Science, Big Data, WEB3, Blockchain, Cryptocurrency & Digital Assets, Metaverses, Digital Transformation, Fintech, Electronic Commerce, Internet of Things.

MTF is the official partner of: IBM, Intel, Microsoft, member of the Portuguese Chamber of Commerce and Industry.

MTF is present in 208 countries and has been chosen by more than 380,000 students.


Short Description: Course will be interesting to anybody who want to acquire essential skills about Corporate management. This course will take practical examples to explain basic principles of corporate management and how it is important in  business. This will help in developing as a corporate person and become a better manager.


Management learning is critically important for both companies and individual managers, as it plays a pivotal role in achieving organizational success, fostering leadership skills, and advancing individual careers. Here's why management learning is significant for companies and managers:


For Companies:

Enhanced Productivity and Efficiency: Effective management practices help streamline workflows, allocate resources efficiently, and optimize processes. When managers are well-versed in management principles, companies can operate more productively, leading to cost savings and improved profitability.


Innovation and Adaptability: In a rapidly changing business environment, companies must continuously innovate and adapt. Management learning equips managers with the tools and knowledge to foster a culture of innovation and navigate through evolving market conditions.


Employee Engagement and Retention: Skilled managers can create a positive work environment, motivate employees, and build strong teams. This leads to higher employee engagement and lower turnover rates, reducing recruitment and training costs for the company.


Strategic Decision-Making: Management education provides managers with the ability to make informed, data-driven decisions. Strategic thinking and decision-making skills are essential for achieving long-term business goals.


Conflict Resolution and Communication: Effective communication and conflict resolution are vital in any organization. Managers with management training are better equipped to handle conflicts, promote teamwork, and maintain a harmonious workplace.


Risk Management: Companies face various risks, from financial to operational and reputational. Management learning helps managers identify, assess, and mitigate these risks, ensuring the company's stability and sustainability.


Customer Satisfaction: Managers with a deep understanding of management principles are more likely to focus on customer needs and satisfaction. This customer-centric approach can lead to increased loyalty and revenue.


For Managers:

Career Advancement: Management learning is crucial for career growth. Employers often prioritize candidates with management education and experience when filling leadership positions.


Leadership Development: Management education enhances leadership skills, including decision-making, problem-solving, and team management. These skills are transferable and valuable throughout one's career.


Increased Confidence: Managers who undergo management training gain confidence in their abilities. This confidence translates into better leadership and a greater capacity to handle challenging situations.


Networking Opportunities: Management courses and programs often facilitate networking with peers and industry experts. Building a strong professional network can open doors to new opportunities and insights.


Personal Growth: Management learning is not only about career advancement but also personal growth. It encourages self-reflection, self-improvement, and a better understanding of one's strengths and weaknesses.


Adaptation to Change: In today's dynamic business world, the ability to adapt to change is essential. Management education equips managers with the skills to thrive in uncertain and evolving environments.


Job Satisfaction: Effective management leads to more successful teams and projects, which can result in greater job satisfaction for managers. A fulfilling career is often linked to the ability to manage and lead effectively.


In conclusion, management learning is vital for both companies and managers. It empowers organizations to operate efficiently, innovate, and achieve their goals while providing managers with the tools and knowledge needed for career growth, personal development, and effective leadership. A strong foundation in management principles benefits everyone involved and contributes to long-term success.
targetAudiences: Professionals with any background who wants to upgrade management skills

Course Full Description and Welcome Letter:

Hello everyone and welcome to the online-course created for any current or potential corporate managers from junior to executive level, that will make you stand out from the others.

This course might become your first step to acquire skill set, knowledges and maybe even a whole new profession, that is appearing right now. Learning it today, gives you advantages tomorrow!

I’m talking about digital transformation. In terms of customer communications in basically any meduim or big enterprises. And for small businesses, the most succesfull ones, they are already doing it in a modern way from the first day.

This transformation - it is a moving away from old way of communications, like phone calls, email, or even fax - to new way - whatsapp, facebook messenger, instagram direct messages, telegram - any messaging apps that people are using in their everyday life. And now they are starting to usу it to talk to businesses. To chat with an online store, with a bank, medical clinic - with any organization out there.

And here lies the opportunity!

All of these companies need employees or contractors who understand how to make this shift, this transition. New channels on the one hand bring a lot of new possibilities, such as chatbots and artificial intelligence, and on the other hand, require a rebuilding of current business workflows.

For example agent’s KPI in a contact centre based on whatsapp, is very different from a voice-based CC. And somebody need to know how to deal with it.

But the contact center is not the only place where apps like whatsapp are taking over. It affects pretty much every customer related departpent: sales, marketing and loyalty, support, customer experience, automation and online services.

So, Whether you plan to tie your career or business entirely to this feild, this knowledge will help you achieve your professional goals in a variety of ways. Because communication - is the essential part of business.

I started this journey seven years ago, when it was hardly even existed. Since then, I have worked with some of the world's biggest clients, such as Societe Generale, British american tobacco and others. Now I’m a founder of a startup called brandy. im

I invite you to my course where you will learn the basics about communications of the future. Welcome!



Before we start I want to give a quick intro of myself and also let’s take a look on the course plan.

So without further ado, here is what we will discuss

The course consists of 2 parts:

In a first one, everything down lesson 4, we are talking about the key benefits for business in general.

And then learning the basics of chatbots and AI.

The second part is becoming more specific.

We will see how exactly it implies to different departments. Discuss business application of particular messaging channels.

And with all of that we are getting ready to meet the main framework –

of ideal customer journey in modern channels. Which will be useful tool to any of your further projects.

And briefly about me.

You can call me Slava. For a last 7 years I’ve been running chat platform startup. For these years we made a lot of stuff, worked with some worldwide clients.

We have become official provider of apple messages for business. Not sure if this is my most significant achievement, but personally, the most pleasant one. A chance to work directly with apple team is really cool

and I have been honoured to become one of the business experts at the Retail banking school, where we are right now.

Feel free to connect or ask me anything on linkedin.

And, let’s jump in!

So I hope this online course will be a good start on mastering this new world of digital communications and happier customers

  • Digital transformations / Strategy

  • Product Management

  • Digital Marketing

Do you want to build a complete chat mobile app just like WhatsApp, Telegram or Facebook Messenger? This is the course for you!

WHAT WILL WE BE BUILDING?

In this course, we’ll use the best in Flutter and Firebase to build a complete chat application from zero to deployment called Chatify that you can release on the Google Play Store or iOS App Store.

WHAT DOES THE APP FEATURE?
